short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Toggle ALT text display on images.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple yet powerful extension that displays ALT text over images on any webpage. Ideal for users who wish to understand image context without needing to inspect each element manually, Alt Text Viewer provides a seamless experience by overlaying ALT text directly onto images. **Features**: - Instantly toggle ALT text on images with a single click on the extension icon. - Highly visible overlay that showcases ALT text over images for easy reading. - Auto-scroll feature allows you to see text even when it's lengthy. - Highlights missing ALT text with a distinctive color for accessibility understanding. Whether you're a developer, a web accessibility advocate, or simply curious about image descriptions, Alt Text Viewer is the perfect tool to aid you in exploring image metadata efficiently. Download now and make web images more informative today
